changes: Empty sessions with zero total seats are now hidden
Edficiency+ is enabled on all Edficiency websites
The status badge ("Open Seats", "Filling Up", "Wait List") now shows a better metric (requested seats / total seats)
"Request Low" and "Request High" are renamed to "Normal Request" and "Priority Request"
There are now dividers between weeks in the request list, and between days in the session list
Fixed performance issues with loading large amounts of sessions
Persist "Only show my teachers" across reloads
Added option to filter to only your teachers
